dmca.title: Notice of Abuse through Google search with groundless information
dmca.body:
FROM : HISAO_SANADA

PHONE NO. : 8336841861 Aug. 06 2006 10:00 AM 	PI
Google, lnc.
1-650-618-2649
Attn: User Support, International Complaints (Google Japan)

August 6,2006

Notice of Abuse through Google search with groundless information

Ladies and Gentlemen:

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the following illegal material in the
search result in Google Japan:

1. Google Japan search result
http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&bl=ja&ig=UTF-8&rls=SUNA,SUNA:2006-08,SUNA-ja&q=%E7%9C%9F%E7%94%B0%E4%B9%85%E9%9B%84
2. I am living in Japan with Japanese nationality.
3. Search word: [Japanese characters] (My name "Sanada Hisao", written in Japanese)
Illegal Web page: http://mentai.2ch.nst/police/kako/991/991570155.htm1
4. The web contains the groundless description and information about my work and
job with the significant abuse to me. These are illegal under Japanese laws. Also,
the search results in Google Japan is in illegal situation to help circulating this
groundless information to the general public..
5. My E-mail: sanada@hotmail.com
6. Web owners' email is Unknown

I have a good faith belief that the web page containing the untrue information described
above is infringing my tights and illegal under w e n t Japanese law, without my
authorization.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with law, that the information in the
notification is accurate

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at
the email address indicated above:

H.S.
Hisao Sanada
